text: Bert Scheirlinckx (born November 1, 1974) is a Belgian professional road bicycle racer, who is a member of the cycling team Geofco-Ville d'Alger. ==Palmarès== ;2002 : 3rd Overall, Tour of Japan :: 1st, Stage 2, Tour of Japan '2003 : 4th, Rund um Köln ;2004 : 3rd, Tro-Bro Léon : 3rd, Tour du Finistère : 3rd, Druivenkoers Overijse ;2006 : 1st, Stadsprijs Geraardsbergen : 2nd, Polynormande : 3rd, Hel van het Mergelland ;2009 : 3rd, Flèche flamande : 3rd, Druivenkoers Overijse ;2010 : 3rd, Eschborn-Frankfurt City Loop ;2011 : 2nd, Classic Loire Atlantique : 1st, Grand Prix Pino Cerami : 1st, Internationale Wielertrofee Jong Maar Moedig ==External links== * * Palmares on Cycling Base * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:People from Zottegem Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from East Flanders
title: Bert Scheirlinckx
